About Joelle

I am a passionate and responsible team player with research interests focused on Machine Learning Application in Business Management. When I'm not studying, you can find me enjoying nature through hiking, basking in the sun at the beach, or playing golf or tennis.

I'm pursuing Master of Entrepreneurship & Innovation degree at Korea Advanced Institute of Science & Technology(KAIST) to enhance my business skills in Marketing and Entrepreneurship. I graduated from San Jose State University(SJSU) with a Bachelor of Science in Applied Mathematics with Statistics concentration where I developed solid background in Statistics, Data Science, and Machine Learning.
